name: The Railtown Urban Eats Culinary Tour
description: Railtown is an up-and-coming neighbourhood that is quickly becoming a hot spot in the city for amazing restaurants. Gritty, historic, and teeming with artist lofts, design shops, and tech companies, this neighbourhood is an interesting mix of new and old. Join us for lunch as we taste and learn all about the Downtown Eastside and meet the business owners that make this area thrive.
